LP.title: IELTS Writing Helper | IELTS Writing Task Management App

head.catch:
Make your IELTS writing practice more efficient
 by using web app

feature.title1:
Practice, save, and review IELTS writing
on your PC or tablet.
feature.desc1:
No more writing essays in notebooks.
You can practice IELTS writing on your PC or tablet and save and review efficiently.
feature.title2:
You can solve the problem
 with a production-like design.
feature.desc2: Since the problem-solving page has the same design as the actual test and you can measure the time, you can enjoy the same tension as the real test situations.
feature.desc3:
The hottest Open AI will review your answers and give
advice to improve your score.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.desc:
Introducing pricing for IELTS Writing Helper.
You can learn IELTS writing efficiently at a low cost.

free.title: Free
free.desc1: You can create up to 10 questions

trial.title: You can try it now for free.

detail.title: Problem Detail
detail.deleteConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this problem?
detail.deleteConfirmDescription:
You can not undo this action. 
 The problem and essays associated with it will be permanently deleted.

create.title: Create Problem
create.limitAlertSnackbarTitle: You need to upgrade your plan to create more problems.
create.limitAlertTitle: You can not create a problem!
create.limitAlertContent1: In the free plan, you can save up to 10 questions.
create.limitAlertContent2: If you want to save more questions, please upgrade to the paid plan

form.title: Title
form.titleHelper: Page number & Name of text book
form.titlePlaceHolder: The Complete Guide to the IELTS P.29
form.question: Question
form.questionPlaceHolder: The chart below shows the number of men and women in further education in Britain in three periods and whether they were studying fulltime or part-time. Summarize the information by selecting and reporting the main features, and make comparisons where relevant.
form.imageHelper1: ※Upload a diagram image or a whole question image from textbook
form.imageHelper2: ※This file can be seen by other users
form.fileTypeError: Only image files supported. (extensions: png, gif, bmp, svg or jpg)
form.fileSizeError: File size must be less than 10MB

form.startDialogTitle: Do you want to start answering?
form.startDialogDescription:
You can pause and resume after starting.
Would you like to start answering this question?
form.pauseDialogTitle: Do you want to pause answering?
form.pauseDialogDescription: You can resume it at any time.
form.resumeDialogDescription: You can pause at any time.
form.quitDialogTitle: Are you sure you want to quit answering?
form.quitDialogDescription:
Save allows you to resume your answer.
Aborting without saving will delete your answer.

create.title: Answer
create.description: Answer writing page | IELTS Writing Helper

review.title: Review
review.description: Answer review page | IELTS Writing Helper
review.tabContentModalContent: You need to upgrade your plan to use AI Review.
review.tabContentInfo: AI will start reviewing by clicking the button below. It may take up to 5 minutes.
review.tabContentWarning2: May occasionally produce harmful instructions or biased
review.tabContentWarning3: Limited knowledge of world and events after 2021
review.tabContentMyReviewInputPlaceholder: You can enter a review for your own response
review.tabContentMyReviewDeleteDialogDescriptio: Do you want to delete this review?
review.answerDiffHelperText: Enter the correct sentence to diff

Payment.title: Upgrade
Payment.description: Choose a plan and upgrade | IELTS Writing Helper

payment.title: Payment Settings
payment.updateSuccessMessage: Your card information has been updated
payment.cancelSubscriptionWarning1: If you cancel, you will not be able to view the 10th and subsequent questions that are currently registered.
payment.cancelSubscriptionWarning2: If you cancel, your subscription will be changed to the free plan on the next payment date.
payment.cancelSubscriptionMessage: Your subscription will be canceled on {date}
payment.cancelSubscriptionDialogTitle: Are you sure you want to cancel?
